Name: Stream Arenas
About the game: Stream Arenas is only played on Twitch Stream Arenas is an interactive Twitch game where you transform your Twitch chat into fierce Chatiators! Go head to head with the community and battle your way to the top of each Season to be the ultimate Chatiator! Fight your opponents using a multitude of characters with unique special moves in a variety of different arenas. Features Weekly and Seasonal Leaderboards with in-game rewards for viewers and Streamers Unique Bosses and Beasts, get rewarded for taking them down Characters that play differently, with different classes, and ultimate attacks Huge assortment of Arenas Streamer Rewards Tournaments In-game Events A long road map with very active development! Twitch Engagement Spawn Events in the game with bits and subscriptions! Channel Point integration Chat commands to take complete control of your characters In-game drops for taking down chests!
